name: BM Useful Items: Queen Sophie's Summoner Staff

pages.title: Usefulness
pages.text: The Queen Sophie's Summoner Staff is a post-Queen Sophie item that when right-clicked, spawns a Queen Sophie Pet, they fly pretty fast and can attack mobs. They also has 5 different variants: Classic, Alternate, Relic, Shy Fabricio Cosplay and Worker. The Worker skin is inspired by one of my sister's skins, also, they are pretty cute.

pages.title: Queen Sophie's Summoner Staff Drops
pages.text: Direct quote from the page BM Mobs: Queen Sophie: "[...], a Queen Sophie's Summoner Staff, [...].
